author: Zoe Schiffer
title: Saying ‘I do’ over Zoom
description: While some couples are canceling their weddings due to COVID-19, others are live-streaming their ceremonies on Zoom. Welcome to the era of the digital wedding.
content:
As the coronavirus pandemic continues, socially distanced weddings are moving online
Illustration by Grayson Blackmon
The day her day was finally here. As Lisa Kabouridis walked down the aisle with her two sons, accompanied by a 19th century waltz played on… [+5623 chars]
